original_text: And David knew that the Lord had established him as king over Israel and that his kingdom had been highly exalted for the sake of his people Israel.
korean_text: 다윗이 여호와께서 자기를 이스라엘의 왕으로 삼으신 줄을 깨달았으니 이는 그의 백성 이스라엘을 위하여 그의 나라가 높이 들림을 받았음을 앎이었더라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord had established him as king over Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그를 이스라엘의 왕으로 세우셨다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and that his kingdom had been highly exalted
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 나라가 크게 높아졌다는 것을

sentences.original_text: for the sake of his people Israel
